snippet: Past accounts about Officer James Frascatore’s conduct emerged as the New York Police Department released surveillance footage that showed him manhandling Mr. Blake in a mistaken arrest in Midtown.
abstract: New York City Police Dept releases surveillance video of rough arrest of retired tennis star James Blake by Officer James Frascatore, which resulted in Frascatore having his gun and badge stripped from him; officer has received number of excessive force complaints in past from black men.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Arielle Dollinger contributed reporting, and Jack Begg contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Past accounts about Officer James Frascatore’s conduct emerged as the New York Police Department released surveillance footage that showed him manhandling Mr. Blake in a mistaken arrest in Midtown.

headline.main: Officer Who Arrested James Blake Has History of Force Complaints
headline.print_headline: Past Force Complaints Against Officer Who Arrested a Tennis Star

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Frascatore, James (New York, NY, Police Officer)
